app_descript:
Brief: NORAD Tracks Santa is a delightful app designed to bring the magic of Christmas to your fingertips. With a charming combination of space technology and holiday cheer, the app allows users to shadow Santa's exhilarating flyby around the world, including a special pass of the International Space Station. Propel your holiday spirit to new heights with real-time tracking, engaging games, and festive stories.
